chapter.title: Seam Mail Introduction
chapter.para: Seam mail is an portable CDI extension designed to make working with Java Mail easier via standard methods or plugable templating engines.

section.title: Getting Started
section.para: No better way to start off then with a simple example to show what we are talking about.
